channel.title: Hire app developers
channel.description: Hello! I came up with an idea of a project and I'm about to start. I need two things: 1) a team and 2) advices about hiring one. Any information will help and be appreciated.

item.title: Hire app developers
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Hi Zack. Welcome to our forum!

Can you give us more detail about your project? It will make it easier for people to give you their advice.

Read full topic
